title: #298: The Hunt for a Serial Killer, Rapist, Paedophile, Burglar - Part 3
description:
This week, Laura and Jim analyze red flags and missed opportunities of intervention earlier in RR’s behavior as a teen. Laura and Lisa talk about their early experiences with so-called “harmless” offenses by male exhibitionists. 


PLEASE SIGN LAURA’S PETITION TO STOP SERIAL PERPETRATORS AND STALKERS ABUSING MULTIPLE WOMEN!!!


https://www.change.org/p/boris-johnson-prime-minister-stop-serial-perpetrators-and-stalkers-abusing-multiple-women
